a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Child mortality vs. GDP per capita, 2022
GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.
Data source: United Nations Inter-agency Group for Child Mortality Estimation (2024); Our World in Data; Data compiled from multiple
Note: GDP per capita is expressed in international-$ at 2021 prices.
